scripts.dev: concurrently "npx tailwindcss -i src/style.css -o ./dist/output.css --watch" "pnpm run build-rust-dev & vite"
scripts.build: tsc && pnpm run build-rust && vite build
scripts.build-rust-dev: (cd rust_wasm_module && wasm-pack build --target web --debug && mkdir -p ../src/rust_wasm_module && cp -r pkg/* ../src/rust_wasm_module)
scripts.build-rust: (cd rust_wasm_module && wasm-pack build --target web --release && mkdir -p ../src/rust_wasm_module && cp -r pkg/* ../src/rust_wasm_module)
